entry.title: Using org-mode with Jekyll
entry.content:
Need frontmatter for Jekyll 

---
layout: post
title: "Using org-mode with Jekyll"
excerpt: Introduce how to use Emacs's Org-mode with Jekyll to generate GitHub Pages
tags:

---

some content, aka this

and the emacs publishing command

C-c C-e P p

to convert _org/2018-09-04-foo-post.org into _posts/2018-09-04-foo-post.html
entry.summary: Introduce how to use Emacs's Org-mode with Jekyll to generate GitHub Pages
